abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Road Sector
            Development Project for Burundi is to rehabilitate selected
            priority roads, port and airport facilities of the
            Recipient; and to support the regulatory and institutional
            reform and effective management of the recipient's
            road, port and airport sectors. The proposed restructuring
            will help complete ongoing activities and implement
            remaining activities, which are critical for the attainment
            of the project development objectives (PDOs). The ratings
            for achievement of project development objectives and
            implementation performance are moderately satisfactory, as
            documented in the last archived Implementation Status
            Reports (ISRs) dated August 13, 2013. The project
            development objectives continue to be achievable. Except for
            the seven-month extension of the closing date from December
            31, 2013 to July 31, 2014, this restructuring does not
            entail any change to the overall scope of the project or the
            PDO. The entire project will be 10 years and 4 months old at
            the time of the new closing date of July 31, 2014.
